scripts.start: concurrently "npx serve -s . -p 3000" "npx wait-on http://localhost:3000 && open http://localhost:3000"
scripts.start:win: concurrently "npx serve -s . -p 3000" "npx wait-on http://localhost:3000 && start http://localhost:3000"
scripts.start:linux: concurrently "npx serve -s . -p 3000" "npx wait-on http://localhost:3000 && xdg-open http://localhost:3000"
